reviewText:
This specialization should be called... `HOW DO I SEARCH FOR COMPONENTS FOR A DRONE ON THE INTERNET ´. You lose a lot of time searching for components for the drone, which could have been used for designing with Fusion 360. A waste of time in my opinion. If the assessment of the last assignment of each course takes at least one week, then this also means a significant financial loss for the student. Apparently the tutors from Autodesk don't take the evaluation of the course assignments very seriously, since about 80% of the submitted assignments by the fellow students are some crap. I could have saved myself a lot of time AND MONEY by also handing in csome rap to pass the course. Very frustrating...
Autodesk should revise the specialization and take assignment evaluation more seriously.

The drone design used for this course is too complex, it slows down my MacBook Pro 2017 almost to still stand. The simulation module seems rather experimental, it delivers often totally cryptical failure messages that can not be resolved. Certain sample files are missing, respectively filed in the wrong folder. This Course could be more taught much effective with a different engineering sample. The final task for peer assessment is way too time consuming.
This is not a course on a general design using Fusion. Instead, this is a course of designing quadcopter.
The drone thematic tires, and there are lot of repetitive topics that we have learned in the previous courses.
Good overall, although did not expect it to be so focused on the design of drones.
The course is nice, but I couldn't find the fundamentals of 'Design Process' taught as such. Main focus is on learning the Fusion 360  Software.
Component Tray was not provided in one of the weeks.  Also some other inconsistencies there in one of the following weeks.

Good content and managed to developed intermediate skills in Fusion 360. However, gets short in term of all simulation studies, should include other kind of designs, no just the drone, in order to view all the tool that offers this powerful software.
Great course! But lot of repetition from the other courses in the Specialization
Pretty good overall

This is a really great course to learn from. It incorporates a lot of things that you would typically learn in various engineering tech courses at colleges/ universities, but does it in a very comprehensive way.
Good but more like a course in making your own drone.

The course is really good and helpful but could have been better if they used the latest updates version of fusion as the latest version of fusion brings a lot of changes to the UI and learning the software on an older version doesn't help.
Good explaination and lucid language to understand for  beginner
I got many new skills with great knowledge.
nice course.
I am grateful to have
Really learnt something good.
It was good . Focused mainly on drone design
Decent, but the peer-graded assignment is a bit tough
Its the best course to learn Fusion 360
Really amazing but can get boring if you are not into Drone Designing
This course was Innovative and really helpful.
Good course.. great for regular users of Fusion 360 !!

This course is amazing and I enjoyed learning. But one thing that can be improved it the students assistance - the week's discussion forum is becomes inactive after the week, and if the learner stuck anywhere in the design (like I experienced) there is no help form the course platform! :(
great

Great course to get acquainted with the basics of CAD modeling. Completing all five courses of this specialization really helped me to get started in the 3D modeling space (without any prior knowledge).
G​reat course to learn about Engineering Design Process using the fusion 360. I highly recomend this course.

The course it has been amazing, I have learned many useful things and then making a drone is very fun.Thanks very much to all Autodesk and Coursera staff!! Now I begin the last course of this specialation.I think to enroll also to others courses in the future. Thanks again!!
Students are downloading and duplicating other people's assignments. It is better to find someone to check for duplication before peer-review.
Great! It gives a lot of supplementary knowledge to previous course in specialization.
Great for understanding the Motion and FEM analysis
Awsome course well designed and managed.learned new skills.Thaks alot
I love structure and this brings structure to design. Thank you for th course
The course was great
This course has built me up, in the field of  CAE using Fusion 360, I'm so glad.
good course
This course gave me a clear idea of making a design from an engineering point of view!! Thanx Coursera.
Very cool.
Good course for learning Auto desk Fusion 360 applications with the live example model of modelling quadcopter
excelente
Great tutorial to use fusion 360 for simulation and design.
a very good course for simulation and then redefining our design after simulation.. and  for assembly
Awesome course!!!
It is a very good course, I liked it and I like it
I learned a lot and enjoyed a lot in this course.Anybody interested in designing and engineering a product should take this course.
Quarantine time well utilized. Good course.
good
excellent course for students of mechanical engineering,this is the best course to learn about design.
Well done course where it teaches you how to design a drone with different steps such as Extrude, Constraints, contacts
Nice
great subject
Gained a lot of knoledge,thank you coursera
Muy buen curso de Autodesk
Awesome course.
helpful

SUPERB COURSE
super
i enjoyed it
Well Done, The course covered the major aspects of engineering involved in Drone Design and Manufacture
Good information

This is a really good course. You can learn a lot if you just follow the path. The instructor has a good understanding of quadcopter. For example, he would explain what kind of improvements can be made after simulation instead of just showing steps. For me, this course helps me to apply structure thinkings in designing a product. Hope you can follow the instruction and also change something yourself based on the instructor's suggestions.
nice
Amazing course with great contents. Well done Autodesk and Coursera.
very good
Good
Good course
Great information
Excelente aprendizaje!
The instructor is exceptionally clear in his delivery. It is a delight to watch his lectures. Many aspects of using Fusion 360 is covered without any hiccups.
GREAT EXPERIENCE WITH THIS COURSE I HAVE LEAN LOTS OF THING ABOUT THIS SOFTWERE .....THANK YOU COURSERA....

This course was really helpful by experiencing me to knowledge related to finishing the design process, validation and simulation. Also, I like the peer review assignment at the end of the course which encourages me to think about a new design and validate it.
good
One of the best courses in the specialization.
very good course
This is probably the best designed part of the course.
Worth taking this course if you are interested and curious about Engineering Design and Fusion 360.
thank you
Great Course
